dialogue and action
to change the story
in a drama/theatre
work.
Subject: Arts (2019-)

Standard_Text: Select, Analyze, and Interpret Artistic Work for Presentation
Subject: Arts (2019-)

Standard_Text:
Collaborate on
solutions to design
and technical
theatre element
problems that arise
in rehearsal for a
drama/theatre work.
Subject: Arts (2019-)

Standard_Text:
Develop physical
and vocal exercise
techniques for
an improvised or
scripted drama/
theatre work.
Subject: Arts (2019-)

Standard_Text:
Revise and refine
an improvised or
scripted drama/
theatre work
through rehearsal
and collaborative
review.
Subject: Arts (2019-)

Standard_Text: Refine and Complete Artistic Work
Subject: Arts (2019-)

Standard_Text:
Make and discuss
group decisions
and identify
responsibilities
required to present
a drama/theatre
work to peers.
Subject: Arts (2019-)

Standard_Text:
Collaborate to
devise original ideas
for a drama/theatre

characters and plots.
Subject: Arts (2019-)

Standard_Text: Organize and Develop Artistic Ideas and Work
Subject: Arts (2019-)

Standard_Text:
Visualize and
design technical
theatre elements
that support the

drama/theatre work.
Subject: Arts (2019-)

Standard_Text:
Imagine how a
character might

to support the

circumstances in a
drama/theatre work.
Subject: Arts (2019-)

Standard_Text:
Articulate the
visual details of

stories that
support the given
circumstances in a
drama/theatre work.
Subject: Arts (2019-)
